thread.section_title: Salem News, Weather, Safety, Sports | NewsBreak Salem, OR
thread.title: Dec. 30 public safety round-up

author: NewsBreak Original
title: Dec. 30 public safety round-up
text: Yamhill County Sheriff’s Office reports Dec. 21 Rafael Gomez, 29, of Newberg, was arrested for violating post-prison supervision. No bail was set and the case is pending. Dec. 22 Elizabeth Ellece Moser, 44, of Newberg, was arrested for unlawful possession of meth and for violating a release agreement. Bail was set at $5,000 and the case is pending. David Andrew Kitchens, 28, of Dundee, was arrested for DUII and fleeing or attempting to elude a police officer. No bail was set and the case remains open. Dec. 23 Adrian Methodius Schiedler, 27, of Newberg, was arrested on a hold from Multnomah County. Bail was set at $500 and the case is on hold. Dec. 26 Florencio Martin Juarezpina, 31, of Newberg, was arrested on a warrant from Yamhill County Circuit Court for first-degree unlawful sexual penetration and first-degree sexual abuse. Bail was set at $150,000 and the case remains open. Dec. 27 Dennis Daniel Russell Jr., 35, of Newberg, was arrested on a warrant from Yamhill County Circuit Court for criminal driving while suspended or revoked and failure to appear on a criminal citation. Tualatin Valley Fire & Rescue calls Dec. 21 TVF&R crews responded to medical first-aid calls on Williams Street, Donna Drive, McCormick Hill Road, Trestle View Court, Linden Lane in Dundee, Brutscher Street, Grant Street, Washington Street, Crestview Drive, Meridian Street, Walnut Avenue and Dayton avenue. Fire personnel responded to commercial fire alarms on Calkins Lane and Hulet OLane. Dec. 22 TVF&R crews responded to medical first-aid calls on Brutscher Street, Wilkerson Way, Seventh Street, College Street, Springbrook Road and Hazelnut Drive. Dec. 23 TVF&R crews responded to medical first-aid calls on Garfield Street, Kuehne Road, Elliott Road, Main Street, Crestview Drive and Morton Street. Fire personnel responded to a request for public assistance on Sunnycrest Road and a move-up to Springbrook Way. Dec. 24 TVF&R crews responded to medical first-aid calls on Werth Boulevard, Everest Road, Hancock Street, Corinne Drive, Newall Road, Oak Meadows Loop, Crestview Drive, David Court, Center Street and Morton Street. Fire personnel responded to a residential fire alarm on Poison Oak Lane and two move-ups to Springbrook Way. Dec. 25 TVF&R crews responded to medical first-aid calls on Tomahawk Place in Dundee, Springbrook Road, College Street, Foothills Drive, Donna Drive, Williams Street, Wynooski Road, Melody Court, Main Street, Pennington Drive, Elliott Road and Vittoria Way. Fire personnel responded to a commercial fire alarm on Crestview Drive and three move-ups to Springbrook Way. Dec. 26 TVF&R crews responded to medical first-aid calls on Springbrook Road, Ellott Road, Werth Boulevard, Charles Street, North Valley Road, Highway 240, Elliott Road and Douglas Avenue. Fire personnel responded to a commercial fire alarm on Herd Road and move-ups to Springbrook Way. Dec. 27 TVF&R crews responded to medical first-aid calls on Brutscher Street, Ninth Street, College Street, Edgewood Drive, Oak Meadows Loop, Doris Drive, Red Hills Road, Werth Boulevard, College Street and Jones Street. Fire personnel responded to a commercial fire alarm on College Street and multiple move-ups to Springbrook Way. Newberg-Dundee Police Department log Dec. 21-27 Shawna Lynn Boyd, 35, of Forest Grove, was arrested for second-degree theft. Levi Riley McAllister, 28, of Portland, was arrested on a fugitive warrant from another agency or state. Jonathen Gomez Vazquez, 34, of Newberg, was arrested for resisting arrest and on a fugitive warrant from another agency or state. Rafael Gomez, 29, of Newberg, was arrested for violating probation. Elizabeth Ellece Moster, 44, of Newberg, was arrested for contempt of court and possession of controlled substances (PCS). Roy Howard Eberius, 71, of Newberg, was arrested for failure to appear on a criminal citation. Tiffany Deanne Current, 36, of McMinnville, was arrested for second-degree criminal trespass and theft. Yoer Jose Rojas, 47, residence unknown, was cited for failure to carry and present a license. Adrian Methodius Schiedler, 27, of Woodburn, was arrested on a fugitive warrant from another agency or state. Antonio Ramirez Guadalupe, 42, of Newberg, was arrested for criminal driving while suspended. Shannan Anthony Brown, 35, of Salem, was arrested for second-degree theft. Aaron James Lewis, 39, of Newberg, was arrested for second-degree theft and a fugitive warrant from another agency or state. Florencio Martin Juarez-Pina, 31, of Newberg, was arrested on a fugitive warrant from another agency or state. Preslee Jean Budden, 30, of Vancouver, Washington, was arrested for criminal driving while suspended. William Clifford Hulse, 51, residence unknown, was arrested for hit and run. Dennis Daniel Russell, 35, of Newberg, was arrested on a fugitive warrant from another agency or state. Subscribe to Pamplin Newspapers
